gobblin.type

Class ContentTypeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.type.ContentTypeUtils

  • public class ContentTypeUtils
extends Object
    Utilities to work with MIME content-types

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ContentTypeUtils getInstance()

      • getCharset

        public String getCharset(String contentType)
        Check which character set a given content-type corresponds to.
        Parameters:
        contentType - Content-type to check
        Returns:
        Charset the mimetype represents. "BINARY" if binary data.

      • inferPrintableFromMetadata

        public boolean inferPrintableFromMetadata(Metadata md)
        Heuristic to infer if content is printable from metadata.

      • registerCharsetMapping

        public void registerCharsetMapping(String contentType,
                                   String charSet)
        Register a new contentType to charSet mapping.
        Parameters:
        contentType - Content-type to register
        charSet - charSet associated with the content-type
